title: What are the secrets to reversing the effects of aging on the body?
first_phrase: This text is about rejuvenation methods, specifically the third method, which is body massage. The author explains how massage has three effects on the body – calming, stimulating, and decongesting. The final effect, decongestion, is particularly important as congested muscles contain a large load of impurities. The author emphasizes the importance of abdominal exercise in maintaining youthful tissues and promoting a normal exchange between the body and the environment. The text then discusses the causes of aging, including insufficient elimination of waste and the harmful effects of fat on the body's tissues. Finally, the author encourages readers to try a form of self-massage as part of their rejuvenation routine.
